meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Inflation Pace Picks Up Inflation is on pace for its largest annual jump in a decade, even as the economy seems to be slowing, new figures showed.
Not a New Era Yet Though Slobodan Milosevic has been ousted in Serbia, many difficult problems remain in place in the Balkan region.
Inflation Pace Picks Up Inflation is on pace for its largest annual jump in a decade, even as the economy seems to be slowing, new figures showed.
Not a New Era Yet Though Slobodan Milosevic has been ousted in Serbia, many difficult problems remain in place in the Balkan region.
E-Mail: The Listed Numbers Some white pages directories next year will list e-mail and personal Web page addresses for people who pay for the service.
Gwen Verdon Dies The dancer and actress, who was an unforgettable presence in the musicals ''Damn Yankees,'' ''Chicago'' and ''Can-Can,'' was 75.
